item.title: School Violence Prevention
item.description: Yesterday I read the news about a boy from Belgrade who killed 9 people in his school with his father’s gun. It was a terrible event. I feel like a monster for losing my ability to empathize with people. In Russia, this would have been a common occurrence. Serbia is very similar to Russia, and I am afraid that the same scenario could happen here. The first harmful action was the introduction of strict gun control laws.
